itunes:title: 338 - How to Make Deeply Powerful Creative Work
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
Are you sick of your work being white noise? Why does some creative work grab people and some is just yawn-worthy? If you want to unlock a deeper well of resonance in your creativity that has the power to move people - this episode is for you. 

In this episode we explore:
1 The Shift Needed to Making Work that Hits Hard
2 Why You Need to Know Your Teachers
3 Identifying What Your Work is About
4 What Your Unique Role is As an Artist
5 AND MORE!
itunes:subtitle:
